message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and the impact it could have on your endeavors, I am offering it to you for $950,000. This is an exceptional opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a competitive price.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  $950,000 is a good starting point, but I'm looking to secure this product for a price closer to $850,000.  I believe this is still a fair price considering the value it brings to me and the opportunity cost of dealing with another vendor.  I'm confident we can reach an agreement that benefits both of us.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. After careful consideration, I am proposing a revised price of $900,000 for the product. I believe this offers a fair compromise between the initial offer and the counteroffer you presented. I look forward to your feedback and hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies both parties.
